description: This Cinnamon Tequila Sour is the perfect autumn cocktail you can make in just five minutes with simple ingredients like&nbsp;tequila, cinnamon, and lemon juice. It'll quickly become one of your new favorite drinks!
name: Cinnamon Tequila Sour

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the tequila, simple syrup, lemon juice, and cinnamon into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the tequila, simple syrup, lemon juice, and cinnamon into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for 15 seconds to fully combine all ingredients. Strain drink through a fine mesh sieve or strainer into two chilled glasses.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well for 15 seconds to fully combine all ingredients. Strain drink through a fine mesh sieve or strainer into two chilled glasses.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish each glass with an orange wedge if desired, then serve immediately!
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish each glass with an orange wedge if desired, then serve immediately!
